pages.text: A misting who burns $(thing)steel$() is known as a "$(thing)Coinshot$()".

While burning steel, the allomancer is able to see blue lines pointing to nearby metals, and the ability to Push on various metal objects around them. Any blocks they target will push you away from them. Any items you target will pull be pushed away from you. Any players you target will cause you both to be pushed away from each other. Flaring increases the range of this ability.
